name: @madeiramadeira/cavilha
description: Cavilha is an UI KIT of components with MadeiraMadeira brand

scripts.sass-build-autoprefix: postcss --use=autoprefixer --map false --output public/css/cavilha.css public/css/cavilha.css && postcss --use=autoprefixer --map false --output public/css/cavilha.dark.css public/css/cavilha.dark.css
scripts.sass-build-cleancss: cleancss -o public/css/cavilha.min.css public/css/cavilha.css && cleancss -o public/css/cavilha.dark.min.css public/css/cavilha.dark.css
scripts.sass-build-sass: node-sass --output-style expanded cavilha.sass public/css/cavilha.css && node-sass --output-style expanded cavilha.dark.sass public/css/cavilha.dark.css
scripts.deploy: npm run sass-build-clean && npm run sass-build-sass && npm run sass-build-autoprefix && npm run sass-build-cleancss && gulp
scripts.start: npm run sass-watch-sass:default && npm run sass-watch-sass:default -- --watch

author: William Novak
